Viewing a Prior File Revision

You can review the contents of a prior file revision in either the default editor or in the Windows application for which the file type is registered.

To review a revision’s contents:

  1. Select the File tab, and highlight the name of the file.

  2. Selecting the History tab from the lower pane. This action displays the History list.

  3. Select and right-click the prior revision. The History context menu opens.

  4. Do one of the following:

    • Click View Revision Content to copy the revision to a temporary file and display it in the default editor (Notepad or the editor specified in your personal options).

    • Click Open Revision Content to copy the revision to a temporary file and display it in the appropriate application.
